subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The fourth-ranked Wolverines shut down Pittsburgh in the second half to reach the championship of the N.I.T. Season Tipoff with a 67-62 win at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: The fourth-ranked Wolverines shut down Pittsburgh in the second half to reach the championship of the N.I.T. Season Tipoff with a 67-62 win at Madison Square Garden.
